title: Did Donald Trump Advocate a ‘No-Wash’ Bathroom Trick in ‘The Art of the Deal’?
subtitle: A passage purportedly taken from Donald Trump's 1987 book The Art of the Deal advocates not washing hands after using the restroom as a "power play."
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Donald Trump  advocated not washing hands after using the restroom as a "power play" in his 1987 book The Art of the Deal.
